attributes.action: We call for a proper, focused, nationwide enquiry into the rape torture gangs.
attributes.additional_details:
Many victims have not been believed or helped and they need to be heard and helped.
There needs to be an understanding of why people in authority thought it was acceptable or right to to cover up these crimes.
attributes.background: The abuse of young girls by rape torture gangs has not been fully investigated. The public should know the extent of the crimes, punishments and cover-ups.  All perpetrators must be identified and prosecuted.  All those who turned a blind eye or did not act appropriately must be held to account.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
